pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, February 23, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Halifax, Nova Scotia

Private meetings

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall with university students.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:30 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:30 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
